description: Occupying an old textile workshop, this restaurant is one of the most attractive in Milan with its modern, chic-industrial setting divided into three separate spaces: a cocktail bar with an impressive selection of gins, a bistro serving tapas, and an experimental restaurant. The restaurant is housed in a glass-enclosed room with space for 30 guests, built on a suspended platform in the centre of the building. Creative and exciting cuisine.
